title: Bug 8730wrong method deleted (packages view)
description: Bug 8730wrong method deleted (packages view) from the newsgroup:public class TestClass {public void foo(String s) {}public void foo(String[] s) {}public void otherfoo(String s) {}}2. click right on "foo(String s)" in package view, select "delete"foo(String s) vanishes in source view, package view is not updated(bug or feature?)3. click right on "foo(String[] s)" in package view, select "delete" otherfoo(String s) vanishes in source view2 is a feature3 is a bug
